description: this is the phase 2 solicitation following an invitation to qualify
full_summary:
======================
[Government of Canada](https://www.canada.ca) logo

### Invitation to Qualify

**Phase 2 Solicitation: Secondary Access Road Temporary Utility Support, Kent and Mountain Institutions, Agassiz, British Columbia**

The Department of Public Works and Government Services, on behalf of the Correctional Service of Canada, invites qualified suppliers to participate in a Phase 2 solicitation for the provision of temporary utility support services for the secondary access road of the Kent and Mountain Institutions in Agassiz, British Columbia.

#### Tender Details

* **Solicitation Number:** WS3793896382
* **Publication Date:** January 5, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** January 23, 2023, at 14:00 Eastern Standard Time
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** January 25, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date:** March 22, 2023

The solicitation is open to suppliers who have been previously invited to qualify, and only these suppliers have the opportunity to submit a bid. The procurement category is classified as **Infrastructure Services** under the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

#### Contact Information

Simon Leung (SPAC/PSPC)
simon.leung@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

The quotation submission process and details can be accessed via the [Government of Canada procurement platform](https://buyandsell.gc.ca/procurement-data/tenders).

#### Tender Status

The status of this invitation to qualify is marked as expired, indicating that the submission deadline has passed, and no further opportunities for submission are available.

* **UNSPSC Codes:**
	+ 72141003: Highway and road maintenance services
	+ 72151100: Plumbing construction services

### Important Note

Please note that the procurement process is selective, and only qualified suppliers are eligible to participate. The lowest price will be the criteria for the selection of the successful supplier.
